
- Code repository:
  http://svn.plone.org/svn/collective/collective.sphinx.includedoc
- Questions, comments and bugs to rok(dot)garbas(at)gmail(dot)com
- Report bugs at http://bug.somewhere.com/..


Description
===========

This is sphinx extension which enables inclusion of doctests and other already
existing stuff laying around different packages.


Example usage
=============

    .. includedoc:: my.package:/path/to/doctest.txt
